text: Execute (part of) try block after except block
I know that is a weird question, and probably there is not an answer.
I'm trying to execute the rest of the try block after an exception was caught and the except block was executed.
do.this() raise an exception managed by foo.bar(), then I would like to execute the code from do.that().
I know that there is not a GOTO statement, but maybe some kind of hack or workaround!
